## GetFacade type

获取应用顶级API类型

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type GetFacade<F extends Facade, R extends string = 'route'> = GetBaseFacade<F, LoadComponentOptions, R>;
```
<b>References:</b> [Facade](./vue-web.facade.md)<!-- -->, [GetBaseFacade](./vue-web.getbasefacade.md)<!-- -->, [LoadComponentOptions](./vue-web.loadcomponentoptions.md)

## Remarks

- `TFacade`<!-- -->: 各模块接口，可通过`Facade<ModuleGetter>`<!-- -->获取

- `TRouteModuleName`<!-- -->: 路由模块名称，默认为`route`
